FacilityPT50.title: Substance Use Disorder Program - ADAA Cert Add OutPatient

MOUDServicesProvided.description: Indicates if the facility provides Medication for Opioid Use Disorder (MOUD) services.

peerRecoverySupportServicesProvided.description: Indicates the facility provides peer recovery support services.

certifiedPeerRecoverySpecialist.description: A list of certified peer recovery specialists working at the facility, detailed in a common subschema.

registeredPeerSupervisor.description: A list of registered peer recovery supervisors at the facility, detailed in a common subschema.

peerRecoverySupportServicesAttestation.description: Attestation by the facility that they meet the standards for providing peer recovery support services.

allProfessionals.description: Provide details of all the professionals employed or under contract (COMAR 10.63.01.05, COMAR 10.09.80.03)
